Projects

Pac-Man

In this project, I've created a web page that produces a Pac-Man with the click of a button by using the array methods that I learned to manipulate the DOM.


Project repository
Eye-Movement

I've created a web page with two eyes that follow your mouse movement in this project. This activity will require you to bring together your skills in JavaScript and CSS to create this dynamic experience.

Project repository
Real-Time Bus Tracking

I used an API to source real-time data of the Boston MBTA busses in this project to display the live location of the buses on a map. The API shows all the busses in Boston, but I used a filter to display only one route between MIT and HARVARD.

Project repository
